name: 2001 A Space Oddysey
description:
What happens when a for-hire studio is tasked with making an adaptation of the 1968 Stanley Kubrick masterpiece. An action packed, fast paced arcade story game.

  • 3 different kind of gameplay
  • A full retelling of the story we know and love
  • High quality graphics
  • High fidelity SFX and music
  • Playable with keyboard or gamepad

A game made for Make Something Horrible 2019, play at your own risk.

First Try Games 2019
